HomeWiki:
Project Description
Project Name: LT_EMRFIELD
Language: C# .NET WPF
Description: Synthetic image sequencing


As every digital image is a numerical composite and the generation of digital images is not limited by space and/or time, offered is an application to enable the user to view every possible image and/or sequence available within one of two colour spaces (Black & White and RGB) and a finite amount of resolutions.

Application functions:

Gallery - Allows the specification of an index visual which dictates the current location within the sample space, a transformation visual which in combination with the index visual produces a new visual. The gallery allows the piecemeal iteration of transformations within the defined sample space.

Sequence - Allows the specification of an index visual which dictates the current location within the sample space, a transformation visual which in combination with the index visual produces a new visual, further a third x transform may be specified. Sequencing allows the user to view any of the possible sequences available within the defined sample space.

The original document that inspired this work is available here: code.msdn.microsoft.com/lighttrap
